Java installed.
Game installed.
Trying start get this
set path=%path%;%ProgramFiles%\Java\jre6\bin;%ProgramFiles(x86)%\Java\jre6\bin;
java -Djava.library.path=./ -Dsun.java2d.noddraw=true -Dsun.awt.noerasebackground=true -Dsun.java2d.d3d=false -Dsun.java2d.opengl=false -Dsun.java2d.pmoffscreen=false -cp lwjgl.jar;./ zombie.FrameLoader

Its open in notepad dammit.

@Z-Runner 
Wait? So when you start it, it opens notpad correct?
Yep in notepad. I dont know what going on.

@Z-Runner 
Oh lol, no wonder it aint working. The game runs as a .Bat file, so my guess is that your computer has associated it with Notepad rather then just executing.... Yah... Ummm.... Try googling ".bat file opening in notepad XP".

P.S.
I think I made it sound a bit overly complicated.

Great thanks. It starts now.
I find bat fix and now its work.

@Z-Runner
Cool, glad to be of help.
